summary: This function determines whether a value is between two other values.
formals: is the value that may be less-than the value.
is the value that may be between the other two values.
is the value that may be greater-than the value.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val a = F::between(2, 3, 5);%0A    val b = F::between(2, 6, 5);%0A    val c = F::between(2, 2, 5);%0A    val d = F::between(2, 5, 5);%0A%0A    F::println(a);%0A    F::println(b);%0A    F::println(c);%0A    F::println(d);%0A}
